item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Poll finds only a third approve of Musk's role
item.description: President Donald Trump's administration is continuing its radical effort to cut much of the federal government.

item.title: Ukraine working on new potential deal with US over mineral resources: Sources
item.description: A U.S. official with knowledge of the negotiations said a new version of the deal between the two countries has been put on the table.
